Rattrap:






The flier had gone down. That was a plus. But another one of the bots 
saw him, and now arming himself. Rattrap spun to the side and planted 
his back behind a tree. He withdrew his gun and held it to the front 
of his chest. He listened and turned his head, watching Ramulus from 
the corner of his optics. 

What am I doing? he asked himself.
